Articles.Content: So, squad is redoing the UI for unity 5. I think if while doing this, it would be great if they allowed re-skins to be easily implemented. I can imagine a plethora of different designs that could surface if they did this. While I like the current theme, I (and likely many others) would thoroughly enjoy making and using alternate UI skins/themes. It should theoretically be a small thing to add, but I think it would add a lot to the game.

I agree. There could be some more skins.

But I would like the old one to be refreshed, too. The grey-ish theme of the KSP UI got kind of old.
